Package eg.projects

Class SettingsWindow

java.lang.Object
eg.projects.SettingsWindow
public class SettingsWindow
extends java.lang.Object
The window that shows input options for the configuration of a project

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static class  SettingsWindow.InputOptionsBuilder
    The building of the content of SettingsWindow with selectable input options.

    • extensionsInput

      public java.lang.String extensionsInput()
      Returns the input for file extensions.

      Extensions may be entered as comma, semicolon or space separated but the returnd string is formatted as comma separated

      Returns:
      the input
